alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 22 at 2:21PM MST until December 25 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West and southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up of 65 to 75 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Highlands, South Central Highlands, South Central Mountains, East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands; South Central Highlands; South Central Mountains
